content:
State Token (cont’d)

  • Problems with entity tags

    • Can only be generated by the server
    • If-Match and If-None-Match headers only work with entity tags
    • Entity tags not unique enough to be used as lock tokens
      • lock tokens must be unique across space and time,
      • entity tags are unique only across time for one resource, not all resources
